sentence.Network_en: Myocardial infarction is the medical term for a heart attack.

sentence.Network_en: The term inotropic is commonly used in discussing changes in myocardial contractility.
sentence.Network_cn: 变力性一词通常用来描述心肌收缩性的变化.

sentence.Network_en: Blunt injury to the chest may also result in myocardial contusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 钝性胸部伤也能造成心肌挫伤.
